h2.a: Health Resources for Parents and students

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
p.span: This is a difficult time with the uncertainty surrounding COVID-19 and the community disruption it has caused. We are all in this together and our top priority at this time is to keep our community safe and healthy. We are lucky to live in a healthy, active community and we must think of those who may be compromised and follow recommendations from the Center for Disease Control and Prevention and our district.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;

span.span: What is the risk of my child becoming sick? Evidence shows that children develop mild symptoms with few complications, unless underlying conditions exist.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;

span.span: What to do if your child develops symptoms: Unless your child is having difficulty breathing, call your doctor, hospital or pediatrician before presenting for evaluation and they will give you instructions.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
p.span: These same symptoms apply to adults and please call before presenting as well.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 96px;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; margin: 0px;

span.span: Wash hands often and use alcohol based hand sanitizer

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 96px;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; margin: 0px;

span.span: Disinfect high touch surfaces often (door knobs, counter tops, faucet handles)

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px; margin-left: 96px;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; margin: 0px;

span.span: Stay away from others who are sick (sneezing, coughing, runny nose)

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 96px;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; margin: 0px;

span.span: Take breaks from watching, reading or listening to news stories.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 96px;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; margin: 0px;

span.span: Take care of your body. Get exercise, eat healthy, and avoid alcohol and drugs.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 96px;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; margin: 0px;

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px; margin-left: 96px;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; margin: 0px;

span.span: Connect with others. Face-time, text, call.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 17px; line-height: normal;

span.style: margin: 0px; color: black; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;

i.span: Children and teens react, in part, on what they see from the adults around them. When parents and caregivers deal with the COVID-19 calmly and confidently, they can provide the best support for their children. Parents can be more reassuring to others around them, especially children, if they are better prepared.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 17px; line-height: normal;

span.style: margin: 0px; color: black; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;

i.span: Not all children and teens respond to stress in the same way. Some common changes to watch for include

ul.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Excessive crying or irritation in younger children

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Returning to behaviors they have outgrown (for example, toileting accidents or bedwetting)

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Irritability and “acting out” behaviors in teens

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Poor school performance or avoiding school

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Avoidance of activities enjoyed in the past

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Use of alcohol, tobacco, or other drugs

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 17px; line-height: normal;

span.style: margin: 0px; color: black; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;

i.span: There are many things you can do to support your child

ul.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Take time to talk with your child or teen about the COVID-19 outbreak. Answer questions and share facts about COVID-19 in a way that your child or teen can understand.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Reassure your child or teen that they are safe. Let them know it is ok if they feel upset. Share with them how you deal with your own stress so that they can learn how to cope from you.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Limit your family’s exposure to news coverage of the event, including social media. Children may misinterpret what they hear and can be frightened about something they do not understand.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Try to keep up with regular routines. If schools are closed, create a schedule for learning activities and relaxing or fun activities.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 6.8px; color: black; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic;
li.i: Be a role model. Take breaks, get plenty of sleep, exercise, and eat well. Connect with your friends and family members.

color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10.66px;
